name: iro (heidiii, usersal, jen10, Scyl, c_b_g)
description:
Iro wandered the vast unknown, 

Through curious worlds she journeyed alone. 

Though the path was peril, determined - she fought,

Unsure of what exactly she sought. 

With nothing but a voice to guide her forth 

And a skip in her step, she journeyed north...

Journey with Iro through various worlds! Use arrow keys or WASD to move. You can use space to jump as well. Press e to enter doors or portals. 

Please note: this game is very unfinished. We used this as a first game learning experience to practice learning new tools/programs during the start of October =) It's very incomplete so please don't expect too much! 

Enemies

  

NPC vendors (not implemented)

 

Tools used: 

  • Unity 
  • VS Code 
  • Adobe Illustrator
  • Adobe Photoshop 
  • Krita 
  • Procreate 
  • FL Studio 
  • freesound.org

Credits: 

  • heidiii- Game design, narrative, music, misc. art & animation
  • jen10 - Art (level, terrain)
  • jezzadawg - Art (characters, terrain)  
  • c-b-g- Game design, programming 
  • usersal - Art and animation (character, enemies)
  • scyl - Game design, level design/editor, programming 

Thank you to Winston as well for the occasional programming help :)
